title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Physics Inquiry Through Making-Based Approaches: Exemplary Open Design Challenges

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain the physics principles of projectile motion (parabolic motion, effects of angle/speed) through making activities
In open-ended design tasks, creative problem-solving processes enable the development of educational models combining physics experiments and fabrication techniques
Based on peer assessment and instructor feedback, learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of making projects and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
